column4: Hi guys, I'm trying to install ubuntu here but the installer is not allowing me to click the Forward button after entering the user information. the button never becomes 'highlighted'
It copys all files and says 'Ready when you are' but I cannot click Forward
custom install,or the install freespace, or another?
Ubuntu 10.10 desktop live cd, x86 32bit on a standard P4. the cd check came back good
